channel.title: [PI] Monster Drops. Rep++ [PI]
channel.description:
Well, this is so weird, I am making it so Black Dragons drop Dragon Bones and Black Dragonhide 100% and they never drop it.
And then I am trying to them drop 2 more items: Dragon Boots and Dragon Platelegs at droprate 10.
But The dragons have a few items with the drop rate 54:20
At the Drop rate 20 only works, how it be done to work? Please help me! I've tried everything.
[code=java]#black dragons 54:20 2362:4 2364:2 1123:1 11212:20 565:30 554:100 1373:1 1303:1 1618:3 556:75 995:5000 1319:1 1113:1 443:100 1622:3 810:16 1452:1 1355:1 561:70 892:73 868:5 1185:1 886:175 1620:3 829:30 560:50 563:47 1369:1 1462:1 1201:1 1247:1 1608:3 985:1 987:1 2366:1 1149:1 15316:1 985:1 987:1 #black dragons 54:10 4087:1 11732:1[/code]

item.description:
@nearfatality wrote:

[quote=“iz3 legend, post:2, topic:395434”]npcconstants

npcid itemid it drops create two lines of that: Example: ill done ones for men and bones i made him drop bones and a green phat everysingle time by adding that code.

lawl this is a common question i awnser it alot

2 526
2 1049[/quote]

In my NpcConstants.TSM

54 536
54 2509

Only drops the Black d-hide.

Well, this is so weird, I am making it so Black Dragons drop Dragon Bones and Black Dragonhide 100% and they never drop it.
